product_name: LAMO Denver Clog Shoes - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Wish you could trade your work shoes for slippers? With rugged soles, plush interiors and office-ready style, the LAMO Denver Clog shoes deliver the best of both worlds. Suede uppers deliver flexible, comfortable structure and support; slip-on design provides easy on-and-off. Plush sheepskin linings insulate while remaining breathable, ideal for cool or warm days. Sheepskin insoles and EVA midsoles provide cushioning and support. LAMO Denver Clog shoes feature thermoplastic rubber outsoles for durable traction on a variety of surfaces. Closeout.
short_description: Wish you could trade your work shoes for slippers? With rugged soles, plush interiors and office-ready style, the LAMO Denver Clog shoes deliver the best of both worlds.
